listener.bounding
Class BoundingCircle

java.lang.Object
  listener.bounding.Bounding
      listener.bounding.BoundingCircle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BoundingCircle
extends Bounding

Creates a Bounding that is centered around the given Sprite. The radius of the circle is given by the biggest between the height or width.

See Also:
